headline: Dragonfly Energy Collaborates with PACCAR on Whitepaper Addressing Lithium-Powered Solutions to Reduce Idling and Fuel Costs in Trucking
summary: RENO, Nev., Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dragonfly Energy Holdings Corp. (Nasdaq: DFLI) (“Dragonfly Energy” or the “Company”), an industry leader in energy storage and maker of Battle Born Batteries®, publishes a new whitepaper developed in collaboration with PACCAR Inc. (Nasdaq: PCAR), a global leader in the design and manufacture of premium trucks, around reducing idling and fuel costs. The whitepaper, Reducing Idle Time & Fuel Costs: Lithium Powered Solutions for Commercial Fleets, evalu
